pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Calibrations of p-Values // Implements transformations of p-values to the smallest possible Bayes factor within the specified class of alternative hypotheses, as described in Held Ott (2018, doi:10.1146/annurev-statistics-031017-100307). Covers several common testing scenarios such as z-tests, t-tests, likelihood ratio tests and the F-test.
